data.description:
Derby is the best place to meet friends, play baseball, and make fun videos.

Enter a social virtual park, unleash your swing and throw heat!

Casually compete with friends in a baseball home run 1v1, or become a champ on the leaderboards.

Earn Peanuts to spend in the Snack Shack on a rotating selection of swag. 

Become a member to earn exclusive rewards, and craft your own private park to host insane fan lobbies with friends.

Hit home runs, become a baseball star, and change the game! Itâ€™s all possible in Derby.

changelog.change_log: Kobe hat thumbnail fix
Lanes are now protected from other players, throwing is now free for all players on the field, new aim assist throw system, new snack shack bundle and items, Fall has returned to the park
New mobile number registration, new Peanut board, Snack Shack refreshed with a Back to School BUNDLE
Final build for 0.21.0
Added fixes to prevent membership checkout from launching unintentionally while playing Derby
Added Player Info board, removed ball pitch cooldown, fixed bugs, refreshed snack shack
Added final code park changes, refreshed snack shack
Added park location on park info board, upgraded Meta SDK, added iOS support, added info panels, fixed bug where private parks couldn't invite sometimes, fixed bug for auto equipping items

Moved Snack Shack to new board and out of clipboard, members can now claim free Gold and Diamond tier gear, added mirror to Derby Dog stand, new gear will auto equip, new leaderboards for longest hit, font and networking improvements
Fixed invite friends bug for non-members, upgraded Normcore to latest package

Added My Park Diamond tier membership option, new pitch panel in lanes for controls over velo, distance, and location, pitching mounds now available for all lanes, hit stats now require at least a My Park Gold subscription, private parks are now FREE for all players, Snack Shack refreshed, fixed bugs including UI selection and membership detection, improved lighting and shadows on neighborhood
Networked catching, new leaderboards, new park info sign, local roster now refreshes, neighborhood has thawed, new daily leader on blimp, new rewards, new Valentine's-themed snack shack skins
Catching now available to My Park Gold members, holiday decor and rewards have left park, updated Snack Shack with OG items, fixed bug where field box could pitch balls to players
PITCHING now available to My Park Gold members, guests of private parks can also use Blimp Club, home runs are restored to field, new message board with better tutorial flyers for new players
New VERSUS MODE, shake bats with another player to challenge them to a 1v1, fixed lag when teleporting inside and back outside the Blimp Club
Blimp club now optimized for broadcasting, music disabled, private park capacity now 13, fixed minor bugs in private park capacity and matchmaking
Members can now access the BLIMP CLUB, new welcome reward for hitting a first HR, updated and improved lighting
New holiday map, free peanut rewards for Happy Homerdays event until New Year, new clipboard, holiday drop in Snack Shack
Added exit velocity, added new grass and dirt terrain, fixed bug where menu wouldn't select sometimes
Optimized shadows and lighting, added Fall snack shack drop
